article: Mr. Green  lives in  a small town. He can't speak very  _  . He stammers a lot when he  _  . One day he goes to a shop. He wants to buy a parrot . He  _  the shopkeeper , "D-do-do you have a p-parrot?" "Yes, sir." answers the shopkeeper. "  Here is  a nice green  _  . It knows everything." So Mr. Green buys  _  and goes  home  with his bird. But  _  a few days, he  _  it back to the shopkeeper. "This bird can't t-t-talk. It can only st-t-ammer."
